mapper.select: SELECT FACILITY_NO, FACILITY_NAME, MANAGEMENT, FACILITY_DATE, REMARKS , DEPT_NO, DEPT_NAME , ATTACH_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CASE WHEN F.MANAGEMENT = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, FACILITY_NO ${sort}) AS RN , F.FACILITY_NO, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.MANAGEMENT, F.FACILITY_DATE, F.REMARKS , D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FACILITY_ATTACH ATC WHERE F.FACILITY_NO = ATC.FACILITY_NO) AS ATTACH_COUNT FROM DEPARTMENT D INNER JOIN FACILITY F ON D.DEPT_NO = F.DEPT_NO ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
